title: Overcoming Health Issues, Eating Disorders and Body Dysmorphia
description:
This week, Tasia and Camo discuss their journey with issues with eating disorders, especially when living your life in front of the camera, and also how it's more of a mental struggle than a physical one.
Camo discusses their years of health related trauma battling a one in a million blood disease PNH, paroxysmal Nocturnal Hemoglobinuria, chemo/radiation and life after the bone marrow transplant that saved their life.
Plus, Tasia addresses some negative comments from last week's episode and reminds you to be kind to others, because we never know what someone is going through.
Watch "Unfazed and Unbothered" on YouTube
